website_summaries.verdict: Young children and fun-loving adults alike will admire this phone ring's adorable and efficient designs.
pros: Comes in a variety of designs and colors
Unique ring shape is especially helpful for using as a kickstand
Can be used for smartphones and tablets alike
Includes a car mount phone hook
cons: A few customers claimed the device was too stiff
others said the ring became loose in a matter of weeks

customer_reviews.title: Cute, sturdy, and useful!
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly such a sturdy ring. It’s feels really good and is easily adjustable. I was afraid that because it was a flower it might be too small for my man hands, but it’s a bigger flower than anticipated (which is a good thing). It’s very stylish, and I just have to say hats off to the maker of these. Comes with four options for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Cory Guinn

customer_reviews.title: Phone case surface may affect adhesive
customer_reviews.text: For the price and quantity this product was awesome. The ring sticks to my phone case without any additional adhesive (this case was a smooth surface). No fear of it falling off. Ring also doubles as a stand. I shouldn't forget that my package arrived two days sooner than the delivery date. However, I have a new phone case that is a ribbed, raised surface and the ring has came off under a little pressure. I plan on super gluing the ring to my new case to fix this. (I used to have a case with a rough glitter surface and had to use super glue to reinforce)
customer_reviews.author: JazzyLeshay

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing. I have had the same one from the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I have had the same one from the beginning of October to the beginning of December. Not only has it gone through constant fiddling, but it has also been peeled off and restuck to 3 different phone cases...and I have three more!
customer_reviews.author: Emera Marie

customer_reviews.title: Phone ring stand holder great little purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very handy little item! I gifted the three other rings in the set to friends at work who wanted them after seeing mine. It's great 4 watching movies on my cell, and video chatting. I just prop the phone up on the ring like a little kickstand. Also when holding my phone it relieves hand fatigue. Great little purchase :-) the phone ring stand holder
customer_reviews.author: Christine R.

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: I had this on my phone for less than a week and the ring broke off. Guess that’s why they come in a pack of 4..... you get what you pay for. EDIT: One month later and my 3rd one just broke. The fun part is, they break in a different way in time! You never know what you're going to get... haha.
customer_reviews.author: WRP

customer_reviews.title: I love these. They are do much better than those ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are do much better than those pop sockets. Also they really do come in a pack of four and for an awesome price. I purchased one before and it’s on my other case, but I spent the same amount for one than I did for this pack of 4
customer_reviews.author: Kili's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Cute and a real deal.
customer_reviews.text: These phone stands are so cute. There are four in a pack for $9, which is a real deal. I bought a $15 phone stand three months ago and it stopped working. With four in a pack, even if these stop working, I can switch to another one without wasting too much money. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D-Girl

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these! I put them on my iPhone case ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! I put them on my iPhone case and it feels much more secure when I'm holding it. I haven't accidentally dropped my phone since putting them on. They are also super useful to pop up the phone on its side too.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Dale

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: these are really cute phone rings. i love how it comes with an adorable bunny freebie. each ring also includes a holder for sticking onto your car or elsewhere to hold up your phone. the rotation is a little stiff though. i feel like it's more like 180 degrees rotation instead of 360 but that may just be me because i didn't want to force it.
customer_reviews.author: ILI

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like the way this looks on my phone, and I like the way it works. It is definitely secure on the case and fits my finger. Some people complained about the adhesive, but that is not a problem. I think you just need to know that nothing sticks to silicone, but rather you need to have a plastic-feel phone case, which I do. 4 stars because I did not need four color options and because my phone sits weird and wobbles if I am typing with it on the desk. I also had to get another car holder to accommodate the bulk on the back. Not a deal breaker because it is still cute and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Nice Phone Protector
customer_reviews.text: Phone Rings look and work great. Material quality glassy so they compliment the phone and easy to handle with a single finger. The adhesive is very strong and sticks to the phone permanently. My previous ring's adhesive is not that strong to i had to press the ring hard to the case once a week but this one works great. Over all these are good rings and recommend giving it t a try.
customer_reviews.author: Sri Reddy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I purchased this product; after searching for and at so many different ones. I felt this was the best option for the price and the number of items included for the price. I love having the different color options. Plus the flower design matches my Kate Spade phone cover. :)
customer_reviews.author: Laura C

customer_reviews.title: Great for phone
customer_reviews.text: I got these to give out as prizes for our PTO event as kids are in love with anything that goes with their phone and these are really cool but pretty too but the multipack was great that’s what I’ve been looking for an Amazon anything in a multi pack that I could break up the Chyna cut down on costs so it was nice to have a bunch of them and I think some of the girls really like these.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Great holder and stand
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to be able to hold me phone better and to be able to stand my phone up on table and these are great for that purpose. I like that they stick really well to my phones case however the car mount portion that sticks to the car isn't any good. My phone, a LG Stylo is too heavy to hold and the first time using it within the first minute it fell. The car mount for me didn't work. I like this my phone because it makes it easier to hold, less chance of it slipping out of my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Shelia

customer_reviews.title: Ring loosens up after a while
customer_reviews.text: I love this addition to the phone. Helps the phone stand up, but not quite high enough to be able to comfortably read hands free. The ring does loosen up a bit with time so it gets floppy. The great thing is you have 3 other ones to replace it with or share with others. The profile is also pretty low so it doesn't snag on everything or stick out too much in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: tnydncr

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: My tween daughters ordered this for me as a Christmas present. I had previously used pop socket holders and didn’t think I’d actually like the ring, but put one on to please my girls. It is now over 3 months later and the ring is still in perfect condition and hasn’t fallen off or apart at all. I love being able to use it as a finger holder as well as a kickstand. My only complaint is I can no longer use my wireless charger as it doesn’t lay flat; however, it really is a minor issue in the big scheme of things.
customer_reviews.author: Debbi Adams Kassin

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to complain about this product for the price. Getting four is a steal. However I used one for about 2-3 months and the ring broke. It became loose and wobbly and didn’t stand my phone up any longer. The metal ring feel is less comfortable than my previous pop socket. It’s not metal though and the color also wore off the flower pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Rubino

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to install, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I really like these! I’ve never had any issues with them falling off or not being sturdy enough to hold my phone. I have the iPhone 8 Plus. Three months ago, I bought the four pack to have extras and I’m still using the first one. I even recently removed it after three months of use to put it on another phone and it doesn’t seem phased at all. The adhesive is very strong. I definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Genesis Chavez

customer_reviews.title: 🌸
customer_reviews.text: I got this stand because it matches my phone case! Thing is after I put it on (I did exactly what you should do which is clean the spot you want to place it on) it fell off as I was holding it..good thing I was just laying in bed. I did wipe the case again and placed it back on. It hasn’t fallen again and I hope it doesn’t I really do think it’s cute! Also it does kinda stick out if you put it in your pants pocket but i don’t mind it. I don’t know what happened but I did not get a car mount either 🙁
customer_reviews.author: Wia C

customer_reviews.title: Mine did not arrive with car mounts
customer_reviews.text: While I like these phone rings, the look is sleek and they feel comfortable when using. I was a little disappointed that the pack of four I ordered didn't come with the car mounts. I have used other metal rings before, and while this mount feels lighter weight than some, it has held my phone nicely and I don't worry that it's going to fall off or break. For the price this a good choice, even without the mounts, and I would consider getting these again when I need another set.
customer_reviews.author: Melaina Lara

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably well made, very cute, and can’t beat the price!! I wiped down the area with isopropyl alcohol and let dry before placing on my phone case, then held firmly in place for 15-20 seconds. Seems to hold well but time will tell. Easy enough to purchase an additional 3M stick pad if it does end up failing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, simple, and affordable! I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I got the 4 pack because I ended up using the silver one on my case instead of the pink! They’re so cute, super easy to attach and I love that they come with the car mounts! They feel a little bit lighter than I was expecting, but they all seem to be really well made. I’m not sure how they’ll come off if I ever want to remove it but I don’t really think i’ll ever want to. They came super quick and are way more affordable than pop sockets which aren’t even that comfortable to use. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Style over function
customer_reviews.text: Due to their style and the colors, I’ve bought these twice. However, they don’t stick as well as other rings do (I wouldn’t trust these 100% to prevent my phone from falling), the metal edges on the ring are uncomfy, and the swivel starts out hard to turn, but then becomes much looser.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Meh :-/
customer_reviews.text: The idea is super cute but the execution needs a bit of tweeking. The adhesive sent with these does NOT stay adheired to my phone case. I've been through 2 flower ring stands in 3 weeks. The ring could be a bit larger, because I have larger hands and have trouble with the ring size, and my husband 6'4" and can not use the ring at all.
customer_reviews.author: Artsy Fartsy 1969

customer_reviews.title: Seem pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how it will hold up, as we just received today. Shipper sent an extra one for free. Thought it was a nice gesture. They are cute and hinges aren’t flimsy. These seem like they will get the job done, and of course as a preventative measure you probably want to replace with a new one every couple of months or so to prevent the adhesive from wearing out.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel & Angela

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful flower
customer_reviews.text: Missing the holder, called support they are supposed to be resending hopefully it has the holder 🤞 other than that its great
customer_reviews.author: beckert apollo

customer_reviews.title: Cute, functional and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I am glad that there were 4 on the package. My first one went on easily, but came off after a couple of weeks. However, the second one stayed on and is still on. After a while and a lot of playing with the ring, it gets loose and won't stay in place when you try to stand up the phone. They are cute and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: mom of five

customer_reviews.title: love this item!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put on my phone. I was worried that it might not stick well in the long run, but I have been using it for 3 1/2 months and it hasn't started to come loose even a little bit. It is very convenient to hold and keep the phone secure. I've gotten lots of complements on it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Giant-Size Finger Holes
customer_reviews.text: These look great. I love the flower design. And I received 5 in the package. 4 flowers and 1 regular. My issue is with the finger hole. These must be made a giants hand. Very uncomfortable. My fingers are swimming in the hole which renders the phone holder useless. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Bsongbyrd

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This ring stand holder is very pretty. It sticks on my phone case perfectly. However the ring itself is a bit hard to turn, that could be a goid thing as you don't want it constantly turning in your hand. I love that they gave 4 of them for me to choose for my phone. I also got a cute bunny with the flowers. Love love love!
customer_reviews.author: Anela

customer_reviews.title: Terrible adhesion
customer_reviews.text: It looks cute but the adhesion is absolutely terrible. It will stick properly for maybe 20 minutes before you have to try to stick it on again. I’ve already lost multiple from this pack because they fell off randomly without me realizing it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hook loosened after 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these at first. The first one I used stuck well to my phone case, but after only 2 weeks of use, the hook became loose and made it difficult to hold. Tried replacing with another from the same pack and it wouldn’t even stick to my phone case. Threw the rest away.
customer_reviews.author: Klafengler

customer_reviews.title: Cute phone holders
customer_reviews.text: These phone holders stuck well at first and were sturdy while standing the phone up. Made holding the phone so much easier in that I didn't have to grip the phone, it just laid in my hand. The adhesive didn't last long though and kept falling off. For the price and the fact that it came with 4 holders...not a bad purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Try something else
customer_reviews.text: I was in love with this item until the ring became loose and would prop the phone up any longer. The adhesive is pretty strong; however, the adhesive for the hook kept coming off while in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Tenisha J Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great for holding and propping devices
customer_reviews.text: These are so great for holding and resting devices. I have one for iPad, phone and kindle. Comfortable fit with hand/fingers for holding devices without fear of slipping. Sticks securely to all surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Sneebster

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I like the holder and they were shipped very quickly. It adheres very well to my phone but is much stiffer in movements than I thought it would be. I had to really play around with it to get it to move around when I first installed it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This is trash. Don’t waste your money. It feels awkward in my hand. I tried sticking it to different spots on the phone and it doesn’t help at all. It doesn’t take the pressure off your wrists and it feels awkward when I have my finger in the ring.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: So much fun and useful
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved the iRing concept as it makes it easy to carry your phone when you don't have pockets or a purse. Having it as a cute flower is just a bonus. Adheres to my cell phone case very well. Is very sturdy and stiff so it holds is position wherever you place it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A Crouch

customer_reviews.title: Super Useful and Cute Too!
customer_reviews.text: When I first applied one of these rings to the back of my phone case, it was extremely difficult to adjust and it eventually popped off. Thankfully, I was able to reapply it with ease and after some more use, it became very easily manipulated. Now, I can twist it any direction and it has stayed securely in place. I use it to steady my phone, prop it up, and I have even hung it on random hooks. Now, I can't stand to use my phone without it!
customer_reviews.author: Negswoman

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent value for what you get and how many you receive. I'm on my second flower! The first ring stand is still on the previous case and has budget one bit! Very sturdy and practical.
customer_reviews.author: PCole

customer_reviews.title: Gifts
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried these yet but they came as described and actually really nicely packages. They're individually packaged and with a little car attachment which was great since they're little stocking stuffers and gift toppers.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: after a month of use the loop became loose and ...
customer_reviews.text: after a month of use the loop became loose and no longer hold up my phone on a table. The Sticker that holds the hook for the car came unstuck about the same time the loop stopped working. I am now on my 4th one out of the 4pack and it has broke the same way. absolute garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than previous phone ring I had yet better
customer_reviews.text: Hmmmm....pretty? Check! Sturdy? Check! Adhesive is strong? Check! Product description? Accurate! Cost efficient? Absolutely! I received the product 2 weeks ago and so far it has proven to be better than the previous phone ring I bought from a store and much cheaper as well. I used one on my dad’s phone and it has been good as well.
customer_reviews.author: RPam

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stick
customer_reviews.text: Adhesive does not stick to any. As soon as you think it’s adhered & hang your phone it comes right down. I love the flowers though & the variety of colors you get.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: I like them but...
customer_reviews.text: They don’t stick to we’ll to all styles of cases. I gifted extra ones and mine was the only one that stuck. The sticky hook for the car didn’t work at all
customer_reviews.author: ps

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. The only reason I took off one star for durability is because the color is beginning to chip off the edges. Otherwise it's really solid. It sticks really well and holds my heavy phone really well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t expecting much since they are so cheap. However, I put my first one on on my Lifeproof case for my iPhone and it barely lasted four days. Thankfully, there are four in the pack (even though my forth one was not the flower one?) I just attached my second one. We shall see how long it lasts. As for the sturdiness of the ring, it’s wonderful. It is also very comfortable to hold. But none of that matters when it only lasts four days.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but was mine a fluke?!
customer_reviews.text: Love the cute flower design and how it looks on my phone! Also love that I can hang my phone by the ring on my finger while I hold another item. My only problem is that I like to use the ring to hold my phone at an angle on a table but I found that my silver holder ring is too loose and will not stay out so I can use it as a holder to hold up the phone. Guess I’ll try one of the other colors to see what happens. Maybe it was a fluke with this one?
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth McDonnell

customer_reviews.title: Won't stick
customer_reviews.text: I have a clear plastic phone case, and this phone ring won't stick to it. I have a feeling it would stay on if I was affixing it to my phone directly, but there's no way I am going without a case.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: No thank you
customer_reviews.text: This product was not a good it had poor adhesive and my phone fell many times. I was hoping that it would be good but it is not. The holding part of the ring hurts your hand and finger and is very stiff and hard to move
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Received earlier than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my ring holders....sooner than expected so I can use until my new phone comes in...got a free "gift" one as well...nice touch....but the hook/car holder one did not come in and that is a big thing for me as I need it to hold phone for gps..... overall, I think they will work as expected....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for about 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well for about three weeks, then the screw holding the ring onto the flower loosened so much that it wouldn’t hold in place. Thankfully the pack had four so I can change them out when they loosen, but I wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: Stark

customer_reviews.title: All's good in my little world.
customer_reviews.text: Well I like the price and when the family seen what I had I gave them all away and I ordered me another one. Only I ordered me a more expensive one the works with a magnet.
customer_reviews.author: Denis Selby

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I just got them and they are so cute. I can’t believe how many come for such a low price. So much better than the pop sockets. I will update after time if they don’t hold up but so far I am wowed
customer_reviews.author: Robert Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as a pop socket...
customer_reviews.text: These rings were cute but I prefer a pop socket. The ring only work as a stand for a couple of weeks before it broke. It was still attached but it was floppy. The ring hole was too large for my fingers so it never felt secure.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Keck

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sticking well
customer_reviews.text: Put on the smooth plastic back of the new case for my old IPhone 6s. Looks cute and works exactly as intended. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: L. W. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: 45 days of use, busted.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this just over a month and it broke. it worked great at first but it slowly was not holding up as a stand and something internal just let go. my phone isnt heavy, I havent dropped it, not have I been hard on it. NOT pleased with this at all. yes its cute and for me holds to my case well BUT that doesnt help that it BUSTED. Cant give half stars sadly
customer_reviews.author: Kahuna

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased a set of 4 twice, liked them so much I was giving to friends. Dropped a star on adhesive because you have to be careful in areas where temperatures are warmer, such as AZ. The ring may lift. The ring makes it so much easier to hold the phone or have your phone tilted up while on your desk or counter.
customer_reviews.author: RKL

customer_reviews.title: Secure
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through multiple pop sockets because I tend to play with them and they wear out easily. I constantly play with this one by bending, spinning, and twirling my phone. Still going strong! They have me an extra as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Love them.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time that I've bought these. I absolutely love them. Everyone wanted one. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks cute, got lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! You have a variety to choose from. It’s sturdy and holds really well. Not only that, it also looks great and expensive. I got a lot of compliments on this.
customer_reviews.author: C.L

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! Can sit my phone on it’s side without falling down like the pop sockets. And can hold like a ring.. works wonderful!!! Price is great too came in 1 day!!
customer_reviews.author: shannon anglin

customer_reviews.title: Slim and user friendly
customer_reviews.text: I actually like it better than a popsocket. It’s much slimmer and easier to put in my bag or pocket. So far so good. I’m going to order more.
customer_reviews.author: nursegordon

customer_reviews.title: I really like the look and style
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look and style. However, it did NOT stick well at all onto my phone case. I let it stick initially for about 10 minutes or so. Then as soon as I put my finger in it to hold the phone, and use my thumb to navigate the screen, it popped off. This happened several times. I placed it back on and waited longer. Instead of putting it on my finger, I attached it to the hook that I had adhered to my car dashboard. It fell off with the first hit of the brake. It looks good, but doesn't serve a purpose for me besides that.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful sterdy rings
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when they came. My daughter has one on her phone and that leaves me with extras for later. Get these ones!! Very affordable and so darn cute! So glad I picked this pack
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: Works well - great buy for price
customer_reviews.text: Have had it on my phone for a while and still holding strong. Great for keeping phone steady for a selfie, keeping a secure grip when my hands are already full, and propping the phone up for watching videos or playing games. Lies pretty flat so doesn’t take up a lot of extra room in my pocket or purse. I twist the ring stand around a lot and it hasn’t loosened at all. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: Good price.... I'm only using one ... will save another for future use and the others to hang up items.
customer_reviews.author: KSG

customer_reviews.title: Don’t stay stuck to phone.
customer_reviews.text: First one fell off after a couple days. Tried again making sure to clean well with alcohol first. Same thing happened. Can’t return since threw away the first one. Bought these before and they were fine. Wouldn’t try again and risk damaging phone.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra D.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. I’ve been using the pink one for almost three months. The ring is a bit loose but it doesn’t bug me.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love and love. After 6 months the ring of the first one broke off but due to having more than one this was not a problem
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Arrived early.  I was surprised by usability.  Easy to attach.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the whole concept of being able to hold my phone easily and not worry about dropping the phone. some of the reviews indicated that these did not adhere well. I am here to tell you that the one that I am currently using has not budged. I love the 360 degrees that I am able to use and the fact that I can make the phone stand on end. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jmcp

customer_reviews.title: Cute but...
customer_reviews.text: not as comfortable. But at least it's not bulky like others and the colors match perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Mary- Miami, Florida

customer_reviews.title: Fine
customer_reviews.text: A little larger than I expected. Got them for a tiny remote for my “sound freaq “ system; overlaps slightly, but works fine for holding onto the tiny remote.
customer_reviews.author: Seaside

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: These stick wonderfully to my phone, and are very easy to use, but the mounted holder for the car is useless. It falls off the dash every time I try and set my phone on it. I'm going to try and find a small command hook to use to see if it's stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not lasting
customer_reviews.text: So, these are way cute! The only thing I didn’t like is, they lost their sturdiness about a month after applying, and if lost all of its color as well, I mean I think it’s an alright product for the price, just wish it was a better quality
customer_reviews.author: JessaKayy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute if you want to add a feminine touch to your phone or case! Fun~
customer_reviews.author: cornelia faust

customer_reviews.title: Quality sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: The ring stand and holder are very pretty and feel sturdy and well made. They are quiet large but if you are concern with covering a design or pattern on your case they place well and look great.
customer_reviews.author: RB Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Good ring!
customer_reviews.text: Love the designs much sturdier than other rings just hard to turn hopefully it will loosen up!
customer_reviews.author: Stacc19

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: So adorable and you can switch when you want to change your phone case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful strong and perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are really beautiful and strong. I love them. I broke the one a friend gave me and missed it. But these are far better. Works well as a stand but mostly for holding my phone so I don't drop it ..... You Know especially face drops lol. Would buy again but so good not sure I will need to.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Duane

customer_reviews.title: Adheasive could be better
customer_reviews.text: The ring stand holder was perfect i got an extra one and all. But the part for the car mouth had no adhesive i literaly put it on in the am and by 12 noon it wasent sticky any more. Which was a bummer. But the ring is good
customer_reviews.author: Looking for deals

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Easy to put on the phone and its pretty steady.
customer_reviews.author: JustMandee

customer_reviews.title: mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the flowers which is the reason I bought it. It applied easily to my phone and I like the feel and the positions my phone can set in. I gave the square/rectangle one to my son and the ring broke off the first day. I'm trying to be careful with mine so this doesn't happen.
customer_reviews.author: simeon rowland

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: These have been working great! Not a huge fan of the flower design though.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Cute, useful and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Gave as gifts and everyone loves the phone ring holder. I even like it more than the pop out phone holder, much more handy! Love that I can wear my phone like a ring on my finger and still be able to hold things in both hands! Cute and durable!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Good grip, badly painted
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfectly functional in terms of adhering to the phone and providing a good, solid grip. However, the black paint on the exterior started rubbing off in less than a week and now it looks really patchy and white. I'm still going to use it because it works, but I don't think I would purchase again because of how it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine S

customer_reviews.title: Cute but adhesive is not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute, the problem is the adhesive isn’t strong enough. It literally fell off my phone the first hour of use. Also when I applied it, I didn’t use it for a day to give time to adhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jamilyn Janas

customer_reviews.title: Attractive
customer_reviews.text: I like having a ring on the phone to keep my finger through when taking pictures to lessen the chances of dropping it. This one is very stiff for adjusting the direction of the ring and it came off once. I have stuck it back on but am a little cautious with it now.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria on the go

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it came with a little “mounting bracket” so I can hang it by the hook in my car
customer_reviews.author: GreedIdGirl07

customer_reviews.title: The ring is not metal
customer_reviews.text: The product is great but when the description says it’s metal but in reality only the small part in the middle is, therefore I cannot use my metal car holder and my phone isn’t secure, this is the only bummer
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia R Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Grp
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Not very easy to use right away but moving the loop around right away helped a lot! Wish the tape was stronger, already torn off one by accident. But overall a wonderful product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Pimental

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and handy to have.
customer_reviews.text: These are very easy to apply. Just make sure that you are trying to use them on a phone case that is not textured and is smooth surfaced, otherwise it will come right off.
customer_reviews.author: MzCat

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I gave one to my friend and she loves it too. Really like the car holder that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Ray

customer_reviews.title: It was okay at first....
customer_reviews.text: Unlike pop sockets , these are NOT restickable! The gold one I received, I originally put it too high up on my iPhone 8+ and had to take it off to reposition it. Within days of me taking it off, it was like my phone was too heavy for the ring every single day after that. I was not able to reuse it after that, had to put. Whole new one on my phone case.
customer_reviews.author: Maya Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: If too much pressure is applied may crack or damage your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Taitiana

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Love these and the look but the adhesive could have been better.
customer_reviews.author: scaramoush

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last a week
customer_reviews.text: This clip lasted only a few days before it slid off my phone case. It was on a hard plastic case not a silicone one. Happy it didn’t happen when I was using the clip to hold my phone. Also the paint on the edges of the black one started rubbing away revealing a silver tone after 1 day. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: M. Youngs

customer_reviews.title: it is pretty nice on my phone
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd time I bought this product, it is pretty nice on my phone!! And I don’t have any issue with the rings so far.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Gave my mom the silver one and I took the black one, and I noticed the paint has chipped off around the edges, but nbd otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Hope H.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and good quality
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my order. First of all, you get four different colors. They are super cute and good quality. The glue seems to be very strong which doesn't worry me about it falling off. It also includes a holder for the car! Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

Smart phone finger ring holder/package contains 4 Phone Ring, each with a Car Mount Hook included. The Phone Ring Grip can be attached to your mobile phone or tablet to provide a secure grip, so you will never drop it. Adding the Phone Ring Grip also reduces the risk of theft. High viscosity,Uses advanced and sticky 3m pressure sensitive adhesive

Mobile phone finger ring with Car Mount Hook :For safe handsfree use of your phone, a car mount is included. A simple but perfect solution for GPS satellite navigation, streaming music to your car radio or making handsfree calls. Is very easy to use the car mount, just hook the Phone Ring Grip to it to place your phone and unhook it to remove your phone.

Finger ring holder can used as a kickstand for your phone : your mobile phone anywhere you want, to watch videos, listen music, make a video call or use as alarm clock. Place it on your office desk, the kitchen counter, next to your bed, etc.you can stop using that pinky finger. Your phone will rest comfortably on the palm of your hand, giving you more freedom in the way you hold your phone
